script.title: time-based-filters.slax
script.author: curtisstephencall
script.synopsis: Enable/Disable firewall filter terms based on time and day
script.description: Time-based configuration event scripts work best if combined with a commit script. Commit script can immediately set the configuration correctly as of commit time instead of forcing the users to wait hours until the event script fixes the config for them. In addition, the commit script can automatically generate time-of-day events so that the configuration changes happen exactly at the time desired rather than just within an hour.
